The bibliography of code-switching comprises all academic and peer-reviewed works on the topic of code-switching. It is sorted by category, then alphabetically.

Contents

  • 2 Grammatical theories
  • 3 Social theories
    • 3.1 Conversational code-switching
    • 3.2 Artistic code-switching
  • 4 Languages
    • 4.1 AAVE-Standard English
    • 4.2 English-Spanish
    • 4.3 Spanish-German
    • 4.4 Arabic-French
  • 5 Bilingualism
  • 6 See also
